cast.overview: An ex-special agent is involved in a convoluted drug ring drama. He has to save a drug smuggler's innocent daughter from being the victim of her parents' fight.
cast.title: The Man from Nowhere

details.biography:
Lee Ha-eun is a South Korean actress

She first dreamed of becoming an actress at the age of 16, he became interested in movies with his two-year-older sister, who was preparing to become a screenwriter, and after going to Soongsil University's film department, he has been steadily appearing in independent films such as "Alley Road" and "Catfish." He made his first TV drama debut on "The Good Detective" in 2020.
details.name: Lee Ha-eun
